# The `MappingTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by any type that needs to be converted to/from a YAML mapping. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;class T&gt;
struct llvm::yaml::MappingTraits&lt;T&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by any type that needs to be converted to/from a YAML mapping.

For example: 

<CodeBlock>
struct MappingTraits&lt;MyStruct&gt; &#123;
  static void mapping(IO &amp;io, MyStruct &amp;s) &#123;
    io.mapRequired(&quot;name&quot;, s.name);
    io.mapRequired(&quot;size&quot;, s.size);
    io.mapOptional(&quot;age&quot;,  s.age);
  &#125;
&#125;; 
</CodeBlock>

Definition at line 62 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
